original: sha za aa lumbi ni'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sha za aa lumbi ni'i sgrub thabs /

original: aom lumbi ni bi lumbi ni sham sha pi sh'a tsa ni sv'a h'a /

original: zhes so // khyim stong bar nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas mgal ba'i me byas te /
analyzed: zhes so // khyim stong bar nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas mgal ba'i me byas te /
translated: In an empty house, from the first day of the dark fortnight, make a fire with a fire stick.

original: las thams cad pa'i thab khung du rang gi khrag dang / rang byung ba'i khrag dang / sgog skya dang / byi la'i brun dang / chang dang / thod pa dum bu lnga pa dang / ba glang gi khrag gis byugs pa'i seng ldeng gi so shing stong phrag gcig la bka' bsgo zhing gcer bur byas pas spyin sreg byas te mthong nas ma'am srid mor gyur te /
analyzed: las thams cad pa'i thab khung du rang gi khrag dang / rang byung ba'i khrag dang / sgog skya dang / byi la'i brun dang / chang dang / thod pa dum bu lnga pa dang / ba glang gi khrag gis byugs pa'i seng ldeng gi so shing stong phrag gcig la bka' bsgo zhing gcer bur byas pas spyin sreg byas te mthong nas ma'am srid mor gyur te /
translated: In the hearth for all activities, with one's own blood, naturally arisen blood, garlic, cat dung, beer, and a stick of acacia wood smeared with the blood of a bull in a skull-cup with five sections, make one thousand burnt offerings while naked and giving orders.üîΩWhen she appears, she will become one's mother or sister.

original: nis ka bcu drug slong na brgyad ster ro //
analyzed: nis ka bcu drug slong na brgyad ster ro //
translated: If she asks for sixteen niska, give her eight.

original: rang gi khrag dang chang bsres pas mo byung ba'i dus su mchod yon phul lo //
analyzed: rang gi khrag dang chang bsres pas mo byung ba'i dus su mchod yon phul lo //
translated: At the time of her appearance, offer a libation with one's own blood mixed with beer.
